other_tests.findings: 60% occlusion of the right coronary artery, 30% occlusion of the left anterior descending artery, and mitral-valve regurgitation.
Couplets, intermittent ventricular tachycardia with polymorphic waveforms, prolonged QT interval (QTc â‰ˆ 520 msec), ST-segment elevations in leads V2 through V4.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Later ECG showed normal sinus rhythm with intraventricular conduction delay.

other_tests.findings: Marked biventricular hypertrophy, severe mitral-valve regurgitation, biatrial enlargement, left ventricular ejection fraction of 54%, and a small posterior pericardial effusion.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No decrease in ventricular-wall thickness noted on echocardiogram 10 months after admission.

other_tests.findings: Moderate-to-severe myocyte hypertrophy, extensive myocyte vacuolization, and glycolipid composition identified.
